## Restock Recommendation | Parameter | Value | |-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------| | Recommended Order Size | 25,000 units | | Rationale | - Current stock level is low relative to forecasted demand.
- A 25,000 unit order, in addition to current stock, covers estimated demand with a safety buffer, minimizing the risk of stockouts.
- Multiple vendor order quantities (15,000 + 10,000) can be used to achieve this order size. | | Comparison with Player's Plan | Recommended order size is lower than the player’s planned purchase quantity.
This approach reduces the potential for overstocking and associated holding costs. | | Estimated Stock Turnover Days | Approximately 2 days (based on current stock + recommended order size) | | Forecasted Demand Coverage Days | 5 days (estimated based on forecasted demand and safety margin) | | Comments | The recommended order size considers the forecasted demand, lead time, and shelf life. It also balances the risk of stockouts with the cost of carrying excess inventory. |
